html:
12.18.19  4:30 pm   pencils or pens?

     if you want something that is light weight with very aerodynamic quality, again i'd have to say pencils

12.18.19  4:21 pm   12.17.19  10:40 pm the reason you don't hear about people doing this is because it's not very intuitive or obvious that this is what you should do. but it works, at least for me. even for entirely unrelated fields such as app development. building a bunch of tiny apps that do simple things is a much better way of learning than spending a ton of time on one huge project that i never end up finishing

     oh yeah that's what i'm talking about

12.18.19  4:16 pm   why are your videos so trippy?

     seems like common sense, really

      also thanks for making them, keeps me off harder drugs

12.18.19  4:08 pm   is water wet

     no, it's one of the dryest things out there

12.18.19  3:25 pm   What is your favorite Word?

     disc jockey

12.18.19  3:07 pm   do u think its as hard to make people feel sad about happy things as it is to make ppl feel happy about sad things

     both are easy, especially if you are allowed to use music

12.18.19  2:51 pm   Have you ever been interested in linguistics?

     oh heck yeah

      It seems like something you would enjoy.

12.18.19  2:46 pm   have you overdosed on your awsome magic song writing powder?

     many a time

12.18.19  2:36 pm   Do you like oxygen?

     it's pretty good

12.18.19  2:32 pm   What do you think of germany?

     it's pretty good

12.18.19  2:17 pm   Are you excited for Christmas? 

     i am excited for the obligatory song study that naturally takes place as the standard christmas repertoire plays through the ceilings of every commercial building

12.18.19  2:17 pm   are walls made of concrete

     occasionally

      or is concrete made of walls

     concrete is made of slop

12.18.19  1:30 pm   is the alphabet a base 26 number system?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.18.19  1:29 pm   can you say something that is out of context?

     that would be difficult, because this context includes the concept of out-of-context

12.18.19  1:10 pm   Do you ever stop thinking about me?

     no. wait who is this

12.18.19  12:34 pm   what is your stance on stances?

     don't even get me started

12.18.19  12:25 pm   whats the last cool thing you ordered online

     3d glasses

12.18.19  12:24 pm   Do you fuel your determination with gasoline or diesel?

     water

12.18.19  12:22 pm   What is the meaning of chairs

     when you are too awake to lie down and too tired to stand up

12.18.19  12:08 pm   what has been your biggest project ever?

     amounting to something. still working on it

12.18.19  12:07 pm   I failed school. What now?

     make your own. designed to your specifications

12.18.19  11:46 am   what are your thoughts on ur fan base

     it's pretty good

12.18.19  11:24 am   u like to walk?

     it's pretty good

12.18.19  11:12 am   is it possible i never even wrote this?

     yes but i think you did

12.18.19  11:09 am   If you could answer every question on this website without it getting in the way of your work, would you?

     yes

12.18.19  11:09 am   Are your videos an accurate representation bill wurtz?

     representation is one of the many tools in my tool kit

12.18.19  10:59 am   Is there a slight image of us, people who type these questions, in your head?

     yes

      If so could you describe what you view it as?

     police officer

12.18.19  10:04 am   Will you come to Brazil and say hi?

     more than hi, if i go there i'm going all the way, i'm saying hello

12.18.19  9:24 am   Are your videos an accurate representation of an LSD trip?

     i don't know

12.18.19  8:21 am   who was ever holding the stick in "ball & stick"?

     that was one of the self holding ones

12.18.19  7:59 am   How will you enjoy your Christmas?

     by enjoying the other 365 days instead, or also

12.18.19  7:32 am   I'm finally getting started on a really big and involved project that I've been dreaming about for years & and it's scary to try to get others involved-- any recommendations about how to pitch your ideas to others so they'll be excited? 

     absolutely not. as you may have noticed, this whole website is pretty much i can't do the thing you said dot com

12.18.19  7:13 am   I love you and all of your work, it's helped me through the toughest days of my life. Thank you!

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.18.19  6:52 am   What songs do you sing?

     i am hoping to sing them all at some point

12.18.19  6:39 am   what should i do for christhmas?

     give everything to everyone

12.18.19  5:51 am   Do you sometimes find it hard to go to bed?

     no, it's easy!!!! sometimes i stay awake and invent new types of beds!!! which is also easy!!!

12.18.19  5:04 am   what is the higher message of these quiestions?

     that would be my question

12.18.19  4:56 am   the better i get at what i'm doing the more i'm drowning in the details (glub blub glub) do you do this also

     yes

      and how to make it STOP

     can't. must learn to swim, or maybe there is a possibility you could freeze it and then walk on it, but in that case you will need to also become an ice climber

      or is this just natural

      yes

12.18.19  4:14 am   how do you feel about people treating you like a prophet?

     it encourages me to focus on prophet ability

12.18.19  4:13 am   shoelaces. thoughts?

     sure

12.18.19  4:11 am   can you solve a rubik's cube?

     still trying to solve myself

      If not, do you wish you could?

     where is rubik when you need him

12.18.19  3:58 am   mr bill wurtz, my friend wants to ask you a question but he doesnt know what to ask. what question should he ask you?

     What's a really cold thing I can grab that's in my bedroom?

12.18.19  3:50 am   What's a really cold thing I can grab that's in my bedroom?

     a pepsi

12.18.19  3:06 am   How do you stop procrastinating?

      you don't have to permanently stop, just take a break from it and finish it later

12.18.19  2:41 am   You like paper?

     if there could be a paperless version of paper, that would get my attention

12.18.19  2:17 am   Why did the River cross the Ocean?

     didn't. that story is fake

12.18.19  2:01 am   are you vibing?

     it's on my to do list

12.18.19  1:52 am   Why do you think the earth exists

     to dis prove the nay sayers

12.18.19  1:37 am   Why do we exist?

     to dis prove the nay sayers

12.18.19  1:37 am   bill how do I climb the big scary mountain?

     with the right combination of sideways jumps you might be able to glitch up the left face
